title: [K-12] Intensive Elementary English Learning Program Utilizing Mobile Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and sentence structure
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term program focusing on improving English vocabulary and pronunciation skills through game-based activities in online learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand and use over 50 beginner-level English vocabulary items (e.g., daily expressions, school-related words) through mobile game-based activities over one week.
Learners can improve the accuracy of English word and sentence pronunciation by over 80% through gamification activities.
Learners can perform English-based communication with peers at over 80% proficiency while completing collaborative missions in the game.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
